Name: Symmetry Lines
About the game: Symmetry Lines is simple puzzle game with symmetry and lines. The rule of this game is : - just move the circle and position it in correct square. - but you can't move circles directly. - circles will move symmetrical to a line, - and you will manipulate the line. This game consists of 36 puzzles, and the level of difficulty increases gradually. there are 12 Steam achievements. Have fun with this game!
